Articles.Content: It has had over 20 flights with no problems. The ASAS can be swapped with mechjeb if you want.

I gave it a try. It worked great, though for some reason when I was on my way into the moon the engine wouldn\'t thrust with the last fuel tank (it was a bit odd). Aside from that, which I\'m calling a bug, it\'s pretty easy, small, and stable. Good work.
